title: AI-Powered CI/CD with Auto-Healing â­
description: Autonomous CI/CD pipeline with AI-driven testing and auto-healing capabilities
steps: Autonomous CI/CD pipeline with AI-driven testing and auto-healing capabilities

advanced.code:
graph TB
    A[Code Push] --> B[AI Code Review]
    B --> C{Quality Check}
    C -->|Pass| D[Build]
    C -->|Fail| E[Auto-Fix Suggestions]
    E --> A
    D --> F[AI Test Generation]
    F --> G[Run Tests]
    G --> H{Tests Pass?}
    H -->|No| I[AI Debug & Fix]
    I --> D
    H -->|Yes| J[Deploy]
    J --> K[Monitor]
    K --> L{Anomaly?}
    L -->|Yes| M[Auto-Rollback]
    L -->|No| N[Success]
    M --> O[AI Root Cause]
    O --> A
